use_cases.title: Create Task
use_cases.description: A user creates a new task, providing task details such as title, description, and due date.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to create tasks

main_flow.description: User navigates to the task creation page
User fills out the task form with title, description, and due date
Task is created and saved to the system

use_cases.postconditions: Task is created and displayed on the task list
use_cases.business_value: Allows users to create new tasks efficiently and effectively

use_cases.title: Assign Task
use_cases.description: A user assigns a task to another user, specifying the assignee and any relevant comments.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to assign tasks

main_flow.step: User selects the task to assign
main_flow.description: User chooses the task they want to assign
User chooses the user they want to assign the task to
User can add any relevant comments about the task assignment
Task is assigned and saved to the system

use_cases.postconditions: Task is assigned and displayed on the task list
use_cases.business_value: Allows users to efficiently assign tasks and track progress

use_cases.title: View Task List
use_cases.description: A user views their task list, including all tasks assigned to them.

main_flow.step: User navigates to the task list page

main_flow.description: User can filter tasks by due date, status, or other criteria
User can view details of individual tasks

use_cases.postconditions: User has a comprehensive view of their task list
use_cases.business_value: Allows users to stay organized and focused on their tasks

use_cases.title: Update Task
use_cases.description: A user updates the status or details of an existing task.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to update tasks

main_flow.step: User selects the task to update
main_flow.description: User chooses the task they want to update
User fills out the task form with new details
Task is updated and saved to the system

use_cases.postconditions: Task is updated and displayed on the task list
use_cases.business_value: Allows users to efficiently update task status and details

use_cases.title: Delete Task
use_cases.description: A user deletes an existing task.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to delete tasks

main_flow.step: User selects the task to delete
main_flow.description: User chooses the task they want to delete
User confirms they want to delete the task
Task is removed from the system

use_cases.postconditions: Task is deleted and no longer displayed on the task list
use_cases.business_value: Allows users to efficiently remove completed or unnecessary tasks

business_requirements.overview: The Task Management App will provide a comprehensive platform for users to create, assign, view, update, and delete tasks.
constraints: Limited resources for development and maintenance
assumptions: Users will have basic knowledge of task management principles
Users will have access to necessary tools and resources
mitigation_strategies: Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance
